Phase 5 (Blocks C, D & E) Samuel Lewis Trust

description: Minor-material amendment to planning permission ref: 2009/01260/FUL and subsequently varied in planning permission ref: 2015/00827/VAR granted 13.07.2015. Amendment to allow changes to the dwelling mix of units in Phase 5 of Lisgar Terrace (Blocks C, D, E) to the following: 29 x 1 bedroom units (+17 units),  36 x 2 bedroom units (-6 units),  7 x 3 bedroom (-6 units);  remove the 5 x 4 bedroom units (-5 units). The total number of units will remain at 72 as approved for Phase 5 of Lisgar Terrace; Creation of two roof terraces at 5th floor level on the flat roof between Blocks D and E, and the replacement of two windows with two doors at fifth floor level in connection with the roof terraces.
site_number: Phase 5 (Blocks C, D & E) Samuel Lewis Trust
